fields.description: The prefix could be the name of the cluster.
fields.summary: CMode: Volume Name on NetApp needs to be configurable (prefix and suffix).

comments.body:
*New Eucalyptus configurable properties*

Introduced Eucalyptus cluster level properties to customize volume and snapshots names with a prefix and suffix. The configuration is applied to all EBS volumes and snapshots created in the specific cluster. Configurable prefix and suffix are supported for SAN backends only
 
{noformat}
PROPERTY	PARTI00.storage.resourceprefix	<unset>
PROPERTY	PARTI00.storage.resourcesuffix	<unset>
{noformat}

internal module commit: f72c3ae7b5b037205f9a35db680ea4afb21bbc82

*Verification*

Configured the prefix and suffix to indicate cloud and partition names in this example: 
{noformat}
PROPERTY	PARTI00.storage.resourceprefix	nightfury-
PROPERTY	PARTI00.storage.resourcesuffix	-PARTI00
PROPERTY	PARTI01.storage.resourceprefix	nightfury-
PROPERTY	PARTI01.storage.resourcesuffix	-PARTI01
{noformat}

Created two volumes, one each in each cluster. 
{noformat}
VOLUME	vol-2FF839B4	2		PARTI00	available	2014-01-23T22:30:10.017Z	standard	
VOLUME	vol-EEE0412B	2		PARTI01	available	2014-01-23T22:31:16.702Z	standard	
{noformat}

Cluster PARTI00 is connected to NetApp cluster mode SAN. SSH to the vserver (IP and credentials in the QA wiki). Notice the volume name from output of volume status command. (Replace all - with _)
{noformat}
euca-vserver::> volume show                               
Vserver   Volume       Aggregate    State      Type       Size  Available Used%
--------- ------------ ------------ ---------- ---- ---------- ---------- -----
euca-vserver 
          nightfury_vol_2FF839B4_PARTI00 
                       aggr1_euca_node_01 
                                    online     RW       2.52GB    523.7MB   79%


euca-vserver::> volume show nightfury_vol_2FF839B4_PARTI00

                                 Vserver Name: euca-vserver
                                  Volume Name: nightfury_vol_2FF839B4_PARTI00
                               Aggregate Name: aggr1_euca_node_01
                                  Volume Size: 2.52GB
                           Volume Data Set ID: 1121
                    Volume Master Data Set ID: 2147484769
                                 Volume State: online
                                  Volume Type: RW
                                 Volume Style: flex
                       Is Cluster-Mode Volume: true
                        Is Constituent Volume: false
                                Export Policy: default
                                      User ID: 0
                                     Group ID: 1
                               Security Style: unix
                             UNIX Permissions: ---rwx------
                                Junction Path: -
                         Junction Path Source: -
                              Junction Active: -
                       Junction Parent Volume: -
                                      Comment: 
                               Available Size: 523.7MB
                      Total User-Visible Size: 2.52GB
                                    Used Size: 2.01GB
                              Used Percentage: 79%
         Autosize Enabled (for flexvols only): true
         Maximum Autosize (for flexvols only): 6.06GB
       Autosize Increment (for flexvols only): 256MB
          Total Files (for user-visible data): 78424
           Files Used (for user-visible data): 101
                        Space Guarantee Style: volume
                    Space Guarantee in Effect: true
                 Space Reserved for Snapshots: 0%
                        Snapshot Reserve Used: 0%
                              Snapshot Policy: none
                                Creation Time: Thu Jan 23 22:24:10 2014
                                 Clone Volume: false
                  Anti-Virus On-Access Policy: default
                                NVFAIL Option: on
                    Is File System Size Fixed: false
                                Extent Option: off
                Reserved Space for Overwrites: 0B
                           Fractional Reserve: 0%
                  Snapshot Cloning Dependency: off
            Primary Space Management Strategy: volume_grow
                     Read Reallocation Option: off
        Naming Scheme for Automatic Snapshots: create_time
             Inconsistency in the File System: false                           
                 Is Volume Quiesced (On-Disk): false
               Is Volume Quiesced (In-Memory): false
    Volume Contains Shared or Compressed Data: false
            Space Saved by Storage Efficiency: 0B
       Percentage Saved by Storage Efficiency: 0%
                 Space Saved by Deduplication: 0B
            Percentage Saved by Deduplication: 0%
                Space Shared by Deduplication: 0B
                   Space Saved by Compression: 0B
        Percentage Space Saved by Compression: 0%
                                   Block Type: 64-bit
                      Constituent Volume Role: -
                             Is Volume Moving: false
              Is Volume Move in Cutover Phase: false
               Flash Pool Caching Eligibility: read-write
Flash Pool Write Caching Ineligibility Reason: -
{noformat}


Cluster PARTI01 is connected to stacked Equallogic SAN. SSH to the Equallogic SAN (IP and credentials in the QA wiki).  Notice the volume name from output of volume status command.
{noformat}
eucagrp> volume show nightfury-vol-EEE0412B-PARTI01
_____________________________ Volume Information ______________________________
Name: nightfury-vol-EEE0412B-PARTI01   Size: 2GB                              
VolReserve: 2.01GB                     VolReserveInUse: 0MB                   
ReplReserveInUse: 0MB                  iSCSI Alias:                           
iSCSI Name:                              nightfury-vol-EEE0412B-PARTI01       
  iqn.2001-05.com.equallogic:0-8a0906- ActualMembers: 2                       
  e4741cf08-0a0a9ce432d52e19-nightfury Snap-Warn: 10%                         
  -vol-eee0412b-parti01                Snap-Depletion: delete-oldest          
Description:                           Snap-Reserve: 100%                     
Snap-Reserve-Avail: 100% (2GB)         Permission: read-write                 
DesiredStatus: online                  Status: online                         
Connections: 0                         Snapshots: 0                           
Bind:                                  Type: not-replicated                   
ReplicationReserveSpace: 0MB           Replicas: 0                            
ReplicationPartner:                    Pool: default                          
Transmitted-Data: 0MB                  Received-Data: 0MB                     
Pref-Raid-Policy: none                 Pref-Raid-Policy-Status: none          
Thin-Provision: disabled               Thin-Min-Reserve: 0% (0MB)             
Thin-Growth-Warn: 0% (0MB)             Thin-Growth-Max: 0% (0MB)              
ReplicationTxData: 0MB                 MultiHostAccess: enabled               
iSNS-Discovery: disabled               Replica-Volume-Reserve: 0MB            
Thin-Clone: N                          Template: N                            
NAS Container: N                       Administrator:                         
SyncReplStatus:                        SyncReplTxData: 0MB                    
Thin-Warn-Mode: offline                Snap-space Borrowing: enabled          
Space Borrowed: 0MB                    Folder:                                
_______________________________________________________________________________


_______________________________ Access Records ________________________________


ID  Initiator                     Ipaddress       AuthMethod UserName   Apply-To
--- ----------------------------- --------------- ---------- ---------- --------



____________________________ Operations InProgress ____________________________


ID StartTime            Progress Operation Details                              

-- -------------------- -------- -----------------------------------------------

{noformat}

PROPERTY	PARTI00.storage.resourceprefix	PREFIX_ was {}
[d-01:~]euca-modify-property -p PARTI00.storage.resourcesuffix=_SUFFIX
PROPERTY	PARTI00.storage.resourcesuffix	_SUFFIX was {}
Vserver   Volume       Aggregate    State      Type       Size  Available Used%
--------- ------------ ------------ ---------- ---- ---------- ---------- -----
euca-vserver 
          PREFIX_vol_42057cdd_SUFFIX 
                       aggr1_euca_node_02 
                                    online     RW       1.01GB     5.81MB   99%
